text: Lucas Brunner (born 29 May 1967) is a Swiss chess grandmaster. He was Swiss Chess Champion in 1994. ==Chess career== Brunner was born in Bern on 29 May 1967. He moved to West Germany as a child, where he won the German U20 Chess Championship and earned his international master title in 1986. He returned to Switzerland in 1990 and became the first Swiss-born grandmaster when he achieved the title in 1994. He also won the Swiss Chess Championship that year.Brunner Lucas (29.05.1967) Chesspedia He is the No. 9 ranked Swiss player as of February 2018. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:German chess players Category:Sportspeople from Bern Category:Swiss chess players
title: Lucas Brunner
